% This is a .m Script

production = [9094 9164	9101 9185 9110	9246 9250 9516 9668	10085 9983 10000 10262 10466 10499 ...	
10434 10640	10896 11391	11443 11508	11885 11944 11871 11652	11911 12145	12153 12216	11896 12479	... 
12584 12805	13000 12980 12850 12844];

sizeee = length(production);

sumthing = sum(production);


disp(sumthing/sizeee);
